Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to compliance by New York city marshals with filing requirement regarding service of a notice of eviction
Summary: Requires New York city marshals to complete an electronic filing within one business day of service of a notice of eviction.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to compliance by New York city marshals with filing requirement regarding service of a notice of eviction
